title.value: Mechanization of vegetable growing is a basis for branch efficiency

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Autko, A.A., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: In article the material about the complex of specialized machinery created in Belarus for open ground and greenhouse vegetable crop production for pre-sowing soil cultivation, seed sowing, seedlings planting, care after crops, harvesting and post-harvest completion of vegetable crops is presented. The basic production of specialized technique in Belarus is concentrated at four industrial enterprises — Production Society Ltd. 'Techmash', RUE 'Instument-making plant 'Optron', Joint-Stock Company 'Agropromselmash', Open Society 'Gomel radio plant'. In the article there was presented a description of national machinery aggregates for the presowing soil treatment (combined soil treatment aggregates with colter harrows; cultivators for broadcast tillage; machine-tool attachments), seeds and seedlings sowing (planting and transplanting machines; onion and garlic planting machines; vegetable seed drills;), treatment of seedlings (seedling protection aggregates; cultivators; rotary cultivators), harvesting of vegetable crops (top gathering machines; onion digging machine; onion pickup; onion harvesters; vegetable harvester; digging machine for root-stock vegetables), greenhouse plant growing (hoisting trucks), etc.
